topSales.name: Cranberries
topSales.description: Tangy and delicious dried cranberries, perfect for baking, salads, or snacking. Rich in antioxidants, they support urinary tract health and boost immunity.

topSales.description: Tart and sweet dried kiwi slices, packed with vitamins and fiber. Great for snacking or adding to trail mixes and smoothies for a healthy boost.

topSales.name: Kehwa Masala
topSales.description: Traditional Kashmiri Kehwa masala, a perfect blend of spices and saffron. Ideal for brewing a warm, soothing drink with rich flavors and health benefits like improved digestion.

topSales.name: Honey Muesli (Standard)
topSales.description: Crunchy and nutritious muesli, sweetened with natural honey. A perfect, healthy breakfast option that boosts energy and provides a balanced source of fiber and antioxidants.

topSales.name: Saffron Cream
topSales.description: Luxurious cream infused with pure saffron, known for its nourishing and revitalizing properties. Enhances skin texture and promotes a radiant glow.

topSales.description: Premium saffron-infused face serum that rejuvenates the skin, brightens complexion, and provides anti-aging benefits. Ideal for daily skincare routines.

topSales.description: Complete facial kit with saffron-based products to provide a glowing, radiant complexion. Perfect for a luxurious home spa experience.

topSales.name: Saffron Honey
topSales.description: Pure saffron-infused honey that combines the benefits of honey with the rich flavor and medicinal properties of saffron. Ideal for boosting immunity and energy.

topSales.description: Sweet and tangy dried peach slices, packed with natural vitamins and antioxidants. A perfect snack or addition to cereals, yogurt, and salads.

topSales.name: Almond Giri
topSales.description: High-quality almond kernels, rich in nutrients and antioxidants, ideal for snacking, cooking, and baking.

topSales.name: Biryani Masala

topSales.name: Blueberry
topSales.description: Naturally sweet dried blueberries, perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to smoothies. Rich in antioxidants and nutrients.

topSales.description: Kastoori Deer offers a rich, aromatic fragrance that aids in relaxation and mental clarity. Perfect for soothing the mind and enhancing focus.

topSales.name: Kiwi

topSales.description: Sweet and tangy dried yellow peaches, rich in vitamins and antioxidants. A delicious snack that supports skin health and promotes a healthy digestive system.

topSales.name: Almond Shell
topSales.description: Almond shells for use in various DIY projects, crafting, and organic gardening. A versatile product that can be used to create eco-friendly, sustainable goods.

topSales.name: Apricot
topSales.description: Sweet, tangy, and highly nutritious dried apricots. Packed with vitamins and antioxidants, these apricots are great for boosting immunity and improving digestion.

topSales.name: Blackberry
topSales.description: Rich, sweet dried blackberries that provide a burst of antioxidants, fiber, and essential vitamins. Ideal for snacking or adding to your morning cereal or yogurt.

topSales.name: Black Raisins
topSales.description: Premium Black Raisins packed with antioxidants and nutrients that promote heart health, improve digestion, and boost energy. Perfect for snacking or adding to your recipes.

topSales.name: Cashew
topSales.description: Delicious and crunchy Cashew Nuts rich in healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals that support heart health, boost immunity, and enhance brain function. A great addition to salads or trail mixes.

topSales.name: Cherry
topSales.description: Dried Cherries packed with vitamins and antioxidants that improve skin health, reduce inflammation, and support immune function. Enjoy them as a snack or mix into your morning oats.

topSales.name: Cranberry
topSales.description: Cranberries are known for their high antioxidant content and are great for urinary tract health. Packed with vitamin C and fiber, they’re perfect for snacking or baking.

topSales.name: Green Raisins
topSales.description: Green Raisins are a healthy snack rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that support digestive health, boost energy, and strengthen bones.

topSales.name: Honey Roasted Muesli
topSales.description: A delicious blend of honey-roasted muesli, nuts, and fruits, perfect for a healthy breakfast or a mid-day snack. Rich in fiber and protein, it boosts metabolism and supports digestion.

topSales.name: Kehwa Raw
topSales.description: Raw Kehwa, a traditional Kashmiri herbal tea, made with green tea, saffron, and aromatic spices. Known for its soothing properties and ability to boost immunity.

topSales.name: Munakka (Dried Grapes)
topSales.description: Munakka, or dried grapes, are packed with fiber, iron, and antioxidants that improve digestion, combat fatigue, and support healthy skin. A perfect addition to your diet.

topSales.name: Red Peaches
topSales.description: Red Peaches are naturally sweet and rich in vitamins A and C, promoting skin health, improving digestion, and supporting immune function. Perfect for snacking or adding to desserts.

topSales.name: Rose Attar
topSales.description: Pure Rose Attar, a soothing fragrance oil, is made from high-quality rose petals. It’s known for its calming effects and is ideal for use in aromatherapy or as a personal fragrance.

topSales.name: Saffron Attar
topSales.description: Saffron Attar is an exotic fragrance oil made from premium saffron, known for its therapeutic properties and calming effects on the mind. It’s a natural alternative to perfumes.

topSales.name: Saffron Attar
topSales.description: Premium Saffron Attar, derived from the finest saffron flowers, offers a luxurious and calming aroma. Perfect for relaxation, meditation, and enhancing the ambiance of any space.

topSales.name: Walnut Giri
topSales.description: Walnut Giri (kernels) are rich in omega-3 fatty acids and antioxidants that improve heart health, boost brain function, and support weight loss. Ideal for snacking or adding to dishes.

topSales.description: Zaffaron Masala Tikki is a flavorful and healthy snack made with saffron, spices, and herbs. It’s known for its rich taste and health benefits, such as improving digestion and boosting immunity.
